title: Cryptocurrency
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: cryptocurrency-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: BC-0105
	- preferred-term:: Cryptocurrency
	- status:: active
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: A digital currency secured by cryptographic algorithms, operating on a decentralized blockchain network without central authority, enabling peer-to-peer value transfer.
	- source:: [[Reed Smith]], [[ISO 24165]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: bc:Cryptocurrency
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: bc:VirtualObject
	- owl:equivalentClass:: bc:Cryptocurrency
	- owl:functional-syntax:: true
	- belongsToDomain:: [[BlockchainDomain]], [[VirtualEconomyDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[Middleware Layer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: cryptocurrency-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-part-of:: [[Decentralized Network]]
		- is-part-of:: [[Money]]
		- is-part-of:: [[Digital Currency System]]
		- has-part:: [[Transaction System]]
		- has-part:: [[Cryptographic Protocol]]
		- has-part:: [[Blockchain]]
		- has-part:: [[Consensus Mechanism]]
		- requires:: [[Staking]]
		- requires:: [[Mining]]
		- requires:: [[Wallet]]
		- requires:: [[Distributed Ledger]]
		- enables:: [[Value Storage]]
		- enables:: [[Programmable Money]]
		- enables:: [[Cross-Border Transfer]]
		- enables:: [[Decentralized Payment]]
		- is-enabled-by:: [[Distributed Ledger Technology (DLT)]]
		- is-dependency-of:: [[Play-to-Earn (P2E)]]
		- depends-on:: [[Peer-to-Peer Network]]
		- depends-on:: [[Cryptographic Hash]]
		- depends-on:: [[Digital Signature]]

## Metadata

- **Last Updated**: 2025-11-16
- **Review Status**: Automated remediation with 2025 context
- **Verification**: Academic sources verified
- **Regional Context**: UK/North England where applicable
